participant_2.background:
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
I'm going to keep working hard and hope to do my best in the marathon.
I want to spend some allergy-free quality time with my grandkids.

content.text: Hi there! It's a rainy day today.
Hi there! Me too. But I'm cuddling up with my dog Wonwon so it's all good.
I don't have any pets so I'm spending the day learning about personal finance and investing.
That's a good way to spend a rainy day! I'm on the marathon training grind.
Oh wow! That's awesome. How long do you have to train for?
I have 6 months to go. It's going to be a challenge but I'm excited.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I like to watch Star Wars. I have a whole collection of them.
Oh wow! That's awesome. I used to love Star Wars when I was a kid.
Me too! I still do. What's your favorite Star Wars movie?
I think it's The Empire Strikes Back.
That's a great choice! It's my favorite too.
It's so good! I love the lightsaber battle between Luke and Vader.
Me too! That's one of the best scenes in the whole series.
It sure is. Well, I have to go now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
